summary: This document appears to be a jail observation log, likely from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC), tracking an inmate on suicide watch or psychological observation. The log records meal consumption, shower times, and periodic checks on the inmate's status, with the inmate's name and registration number partially visible but largely redacted or obscured.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The log is tracking an inmate, and from context and registration number format, it is strongly implied to be Jeffrey Epstein, who was in custody at MCC in July 2019.

events.title: Epstein on Suicide Watch/Psych Observation
events.description: Documentation of Jeffrey Epstein being placed under suicide watch or psychological observation while in custody at MCC, with detailed logs of his activities, meals, and checks.

keyFacts: The document is a detailed observation log for an inmate on suicide watch or psychological observation, dated July 2019.
The inmate's name and registration number (76318-054) are partially visible but heavily redacted/obscured, consistent with Jeffrey Epstein's Bureau of Prisons register number.
The log meticulously records meal consumption (breakfast, lunch, dinner), liquid intake, shower times, and periodic status checks (e.g., 'INMATE is OUT').
The document indicates strict observation protocols, including allowed items (safety toothbrush, safety pen) and requirements for suicide smock/blanket use.
This log likely originates from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York where Epstein was held prior to his death.
